name: ai-testing-scripts
description: Shortcut scripts for running coverage and build tasks from the .ai/testing folder.

scripts.generate-components: npm run component:generate-components && npm run state:generate-components && npm run prop:generate-components && npm run event:generate-components && npm run listen:generate-components && npm run method:generate-components
scripts.component:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/Component && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
scripts.state:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/State && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
scripts.prop:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/Prop && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
scripts.event:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/Event && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
scripts.listen:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/Listen && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
scripts.method:generate-components: cd ../../Testing/Decorators/Method && node coverage.js && node generate-components.js && node coverage.js
